Rulings.Tengu: ●If Hyper Hammerhead attacks Des Kangaroo in Defense Position, their effects form a chain; Hyper Hammerhead is Step 1 because it is the turn player's effect, and Des Kangaroo is Step 2. Des Kangaroo resolves first and destroys Hyper Hammerhead, then Hyper Hammerhead resolves and Des Kangaroo is returned to the owner's hand.
Rulings.Goat: ●If Hyper Hammerhead attacks Des Kangaroo in Defense Position, their effects form a chain; Hyper Hammerhead is Step 1 because it is the turn player's effect, and Des Kangaroo is Step 2. Des Kangaroo resolves first and destroys Hyper Hammerhead, then Hyper Hammerhead resolves and Des Kangaroo is returned to the owner's hand.

Rulings.Base: 1.
